basics.name: Donald DeAngelo Rose
basics.label: Systems Architecture | Senior Developer
basics.summary: Results-oriented and innovative Senior Software Engineer with DevOps experience. Easily communicates complex technical requirements to non-technical stakeholders. Excellent leadership record of leading development teams in enterprise-wide development projects. Flexible professional with experience developing and building IT solutions.

work.summary: Bivines Group is a business management firm that acquires & develop small businesses.
highlights: Implemented B2B and B2C web components and features responsible for sample orders, analytic reporting, LRM & CEU course completion and certificate generations.
Analyzed clients request that included content, contract specific products, feature request.
Collaborated with cross-functional development team members to analyze potential system solutions based on evolving client requirements.
Built outstanding and dynamic team of software engineers and developers which significantly boosted overall success of organization.

Created commercial and enterprise websites, apps, emails and CMS templates that adhered to specific brand standards requirements, include content mapping, wire-framing, CMS integration, code guide and maintenance plan.
Maintained current and in-depth understanding of business processes, needs and objectives.
Worked with developers and engineers to realize technological solutions.
Authored development guidelines to expedite application design efforts through ready-made frameworks.
Customized in-development software to clients' current hardware environments, designing applications to span multiple systems.
Contributed heavily to product development lifecycle of both back-end and customer-facing solutions.
Reviewed business success drivers, applying strategic prioritization to future architectural updates.
Constructed architecture governance processes, communicating parameters to development staff during adoption training.
Created migration strategies to bridge development gaps between existing software architecture and future updates.
Drafted visual representations of software architecture design for presentation to stakeholders.
Communicated software architecture strategies to senior leadership and third-party business leaders.

work.summary: Lead developer for Shaw's commercial division digital assets
highlights: Worked effectively with cross-functional design teams to create software solutions that elevated client side experience and significantly improved overall functionality and performance.
Monitored automated build and continuous software integration process to drive build/release failure resolution.
Developed, maintained , and designed custom Word press themes for commercial brands.
Wrote code and supported architecture in high-throughput systems on AWS and Microsoft Azure cloud.
Worked closely with software development and testing team members to design and develop robust solutions to meet client requirements for functionality, scalability and performance.
Managed testing cycles, including test plan creation, development of scripts and coordination of user acceptance testing in Clarizen-Prism and Workfront.
Wrote code and supported architecture in Microsoft Visual Studio, Tortoise SVN, Kentico, created a in-house AWS commercial stack that supported various project.
Designed and built automation tools and application that resulted in 90% cost efficiency by migrating and condensing servers in AWS.
Created procedures for system monitoring, recovery, backup and optimization.
Worked closely with other business analysts, development teams and infrastructure specialists to deliver high availability solutions for mission-critical applications.
Managed and Maintained over 300 brand Microsites hosted on various platforms such as AWS, Elastic Beanstalk and Microsoft Azure
Developed user interfaces with modern JavaScript frameworks, HTML5 and CSS3.
Worked on e-commerce maintenance and management for client websites.
Collaborated with product managers, testers, and developers to initiate process improvements
Adhered to best practices for software development methodology and web security.
Participated in project development through entire Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC).
Studied user requirements and implemented requirements into solutions.
Designed and implemented web components across new and existing designs.
Maintained website analysis spreadsheet by monitoring activity.
Researched and developed new technology designs.
Investigated multiple threading, concurrency, design patterns and resulting impacts on application concurrency to improve procedures.
Presented projects to marketing department to promote web applications to clients.
Developed tech curriculum for programs with assessments, to facilitate class lessons and measure success.
Instructed sessions that helped build a foundational understanding of basic programming principles.
Setup promotional campaigns to generate more enrollments with the school and programs offered.
Hosted presentations and workshop to enact interest in technology with children and teens.

volunteer.summary: Mentored at risk youth to help make the adjustments to environment changes.
highlights: Awarded 'Mentor of the Month'

volunteer.summary: Developed and taught weekend programming courses for 4th to 9th graders and adults.
